name: tiles-image-encoder
description: SUPER SIZE image encoder, which can avoid OOM issue

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && vite build --config vite.config.js && cp package.lib.json ./dist/package.json && cp ../README_web.md ./dist/README.md && rm ./dist/tiles-image-encoder.umd.js && mv ./dist/tiles-image-encoder.es.js ./dist/tiles-image-encoder.js && cp src/wasm/tilesimageencoder.wasm ./dist

author: gezilinll
